abstract: The Raon Everun ultramobile PC, which starts at $799, has a 4.8-inch touchscreen and a full mini-keyboard with touchpad.
snippet: The Raon Everun ultramobile PC, which starts at $799, has a 4.8-inch touchscreen and a full mini-keyboard with touchpad.
lead_paragraph: Few e-commerce companies scour Asia’s electronics markets like Dynamism.com. This company imports and sells cellphones, laptops and accessories fresh from the streets of Tokyo and Seoul. Its latest catch is the Raon Everun ultramobile PC, a minicomputer that is six inches long and runs Microsoft Windows XP.

headline.main: An Ultramobile PC, All of Six Inches Long, Is an Importer’s Latest Find
headline.print_headline: An Ultramobile PC, All of Six Inches Long, Is an Importer’s Latest Find
